text: @LiberalVoiceHospital privatization is linked to worse quality care for patients - new research 🚨🏥💰👎 A recent review of peer-reviewed research on the effects of outsourcing on quality of care found that while privatization may cut costs, it's also linked to worse patient outcomes. 🤝🏼Let's keep healthcare public and prioritize patient care over profits! 💪🏼
